column5: After heading out onto the water a couple of trips after reading Garry2R's Toad and Senko threads, I feel like it's fine tuned my techniques in largemouth fishing. Hit the water today and started the day off with a toad fish here and there in lily pads, and then went over to crank/senko in about 8-10FOW. That's when I pulled my PB on a wacky rig PINK senko  3lb 10oz.    So for whoever that didn't read his threads, go for a quick look!
nice looking fish in the left hand.
Garry2R's tips helped put more fish in the boats for me also. Thanks!!
Congratulations on the PB. Glad those ideas helped you-guys Garry2R's
Congrats on the PB. I know this site has made me a better fishermen too for sure.
